components.name: yaIZTK
components.content: In this section, we'll ask you to confirm and agree with the declarations.

pages.title: Confirm that you have read and agree with the following declarations.

components.name: MumnzN
components.title: Confirm that you have read and agree with the following declarations.

components.name: CzMnku
components.title: I confirm that I have read and agree with the declarations

items.text: I am content that the household understands the commitment and importance
items.value: I am content that the household understands the commitment and importance

items.text: I agree to maintain regular and ongoing communication with the household as their property progresses
items.value: I agree to maintain regular and ongoing communication with the household as their property progresses

items.text: I have not and will not make any applications to alternative funding schemes for these adaptations that could be considered duplicate funding (for example, the Exceptional Costs Fund or Disabled Facilities Grant)
items.value: I have not and will not make any applications to alternative funding schemes for these adaptations that could be considered duplicate funding (for example, the Exceptional Costs Fund or Disabled Facilities Grant)

items.text: No personal or identifiable information is included in the application
items.value: No personal or identifiable information is included in the application

items.text: Our section 151 officer has read the guidance for the grant and confirmed that the application is accurate, represents value for money, and that proposed adaptations are necessary to meet the needs of the household
items.value: Our section 151 officer has read the guidance for the grant and confirmed that the application is accurate, represents value for money, and that proposed adaptations are necessary to meet the needs of the household

items.text: I confirm that I have read and agree with the declarations
items.value: I confirm that I have read and agree with the declarations
